title: permabanned
body: just checking if a permabanned account can still post on the forums

replies.body: Yep! Looks like your test worked.

replies.poster: W A F O N G
replies.body:
hello, can someone help me how to unbanned my account. i dont know why my account as been permernently  banned. :( please help me
W A F O N G
well, yeah as some people will have questions about their suspension so they allow them to still post on boards if they have questions about it and such.
